solution.linktext: To learn more about the Signature Cloud Support benefit, please read this overview.
Using Access and Contract IDs to create support incidents
Welcome to Microsoft Partner Signature Cloud Support
RSC'den Microsoft İş Ortağı Ağı Yardımı Alma

submission.title: Submit a Signature Cloud Support incident
submission.description: When you submit an incident online, a technical support representative will contact you within one business day.

call.title: Call an agent
call.description: Speak to a Regional Service Center agent by phone.
